# Getting Sentimental About Coffee

This application can be used to compare the sentiments of tweets about different words related to coffee, including coffee shops.

## Use this App to:

* View word clouds 
* Examine the overall sentiments of tweets
* Explore the most common sentiments of the tweets and the words that contribute to them
